original_title: 100 Boyfriends Mixtape #3: Fuck Boy Anthem / How I Spent My Summer Vacation
overview: 100 Boyfriends Mixtape 3: Fuck Boy Anthem/How I Spent My Summer Vacation is a choreofilm/video zine mixtape that was made in intervals in the summer of 2020; itâ€™s one of three mixtapes in a series Purnell conceptualized as video zine versions of his 20-year running print zine Fag School. The videos also give his recently published book of short stories, flash fiction, and stories told-in-verse, 100 Boyfriends, its name and inspiration.
title: 100 Boyfriends Mixtape #3: Fuck Boy Anthem / How I Spent My Summer Vacation
